title: Vegas illusionist Criss Angel cancels shows to visit ill son
text:
Vegas illusionist Criss Angel cancels shows to visit ill son 
Associated Press Saturday 24th October, 2015 
LAS VEGAS (AP) -- Las Vegas magician Criss Angel says he's canceling shows for the first time in seven years to visit his young son who was recently diagnosed with leukemia....     For   The 2016 ... David Bowie to release new album Blackstar on his 69th birthday The Telegraph
